verses.name: Luke 2:32
verses.text: A light to lighten the Gentiles, and the glory of thy people Israel.

verses.name: Luke 2:33
verses.text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him.

verses.name: Luke 2:34
verses.text: And Simeon blessed them, and said unto Mary his mother, Behold, this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel; and for a sign which shall be spoken against;

verses.name: Luke 2:35
verses.text: (Yea, a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also,) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.
